You know what else is dangerous to a democracy? Rivers that repeatedly catch fire and burn for days at a time. A wildfire season that lasts all year long. That 1% of the population hordes 90% of the wealth of this nation. Those things, along with the ChristoFascist cult are our most pressing issues.

"Wildfire" is a song written by #MichaelMurphey and #LarryCansler. It was originally recorded by Murphey, who had yet to add his middle name to his recorded work, and appears on his #gold-plus 1975 album #BlueSkyNightThunder. Released in February 1975 as the album's #leadSingle.

This pro-logging legislation would roll back bedrock conservation laws, silence public input, and fast-track destructive logging projects. It's a giveaway to timber industry lobbyists, not a real solution to wildfire risk.Public land is OUR land.
